title: Elon Musk’s Lawyers Subpoena Twitter Whistle-Blower
description: Peiter Zatko’s accusations of false statements and security shortcomings at Twitter may be used by Mr. Musk in the legal battle over a $44 billion acquisition of the company.

title: FTC Sues Over Tracking Data That Could Expose Visits to Abortion Clinics
description: Federal regulators said the sale of geolocation information on tens of millions of smartphones could expose people’s visits to private places.
